WorkItem.Description:
Dear,
 
I have produced a self-contained solution demonstrating a problem about focus events when clicking (e.g. to sort) on a column header.
 
Thanks,
 
Julie
 
Procedure
------------
Unzip annexed file
Start Visual Studio 2008 and adjust the reference to 'WPFToolkit.dll' (I used v3.5.40128.1) in the  solution project
 
Scenario
----------
Start Application ... this shows the grid and a DOS console  as well
 
Step 1 (correct result): Click on 'B1' then on 'B2' ... you get  in the DOS console:
 
1.=== OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged
1.+++ OnGotFocus
1.+++ OnGotKeyboardFocus
1.=== OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged
2.=== OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged
1.--- OnLostKeyboardFocus
1.--- OnLostFocus
2.+++ OnGotFocus
2.+++ OnGotKeyboardFocus
2.=== OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged
 
Step 2 (correct result): Click on 'B1' then on the row header of 'B2' ... you get  in the DOS console:
 
1.=== OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged
1.+++ OnGotFocus
1.+++ OnGotKeyboardFocus
1.=== OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged
2.=== OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged
1.--- OnLostKeyboardFocus
1.--- OnLostFocus
2.+++ OnGotFocus
2.+++ OnGotKeyboardFocus
2.--- OnLostKeyboardFocus
2.--- OnLostFocus
2.+++ OnGotFocus
2.+++ OnGotKeyboardFocus
 
Step 3 (incorrect result): Click on 'B1' then on the column header (Name) of 'B2' ... you get  in the DOS console:
 
1.=== OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged
1.+++ OnGotFocus
1.+++ OnGotKeyboardFocus
 
End
WorkItem.Summary: Datagrid : 'focus events' not reported when clicking on column header
